item.name: Other Keyboard Remaps
item.appendix: These are key remaps I made and decided not to use. I save them because I may want to reuse them again in the future for either actual use in my workflow or to reuse the code for building another.

item.name: On Hold: Right Bracket to Command + Option
item.appendix: (+ When you hold `right bracket` send Command_R. If you tap, send `right Bracket`

item.name: On Hold: Left Bracket to Control_R
item.appendix: (+ When you hold `left bracket` send Command_R. If you tap, send `Left Bracket`
